title: Tukde Tukde Sach
description: 'Tukde-Tukde Sach' is a collection of poems written by Dr. Manoj Kulshreshtha over a period of 40 years. It covers his transition from an adolescent boy to a now retired Professor. The poems encompass his journey through life, its turbulence, love and agony, pain and isolation, his search for meaning and bewilderment. Many sensitive souls passing through the turmoil of life, its pain and emotions may identify themselves with these poems. In a way, this collection is his attempt to search and compile his own self.
author: Manoj Kulshreshtha
